whoCanSee.question: Do you see our prompts?
whoCanSee.answer: No. Veil-it operates entirely locally on your machine. Your prompts are analyzed and masked directly in your browser before being sent to AI services. We store only analytics (type of sensitive data, number of prompts, etc.) so you can then access them in the dashboard.

gdprCompliant.question: GDPR compliant?
gdprCompliant.answer: Yes, completely. Veil-it was designed from the ground up to be GDPR compliant.

whenImplement.question: When can we implement this?
whenImplement.answer: Right now. Installing Veil-it takes just 2 minutes if you have MDM to install the Chrome extension. No additional infrastructure is required, and protection is immediate once installed.
